docsTags.text: - Content is placed between the named slots if provided without a slot.
docsTags.name: slot

docsTags.text: `button-icon` - Should be used on an icon in a button that has no text.
docsTags.name: slot

docsTags.text: `button-left` - Content is placed to the left of the button text.
docsTags.name: slot

docsTags.text: `button-right` - Content is placed to the right of the button text.
docsTags.name: slot

properties.name: disabled
properties.docs: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the button.
properties.description: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the button.

properties.name: display
properties.docs: Specifies [CSS display property](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/display) of the custom element.
properties.description: Specifies [CSS display property](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/display) of the custom element.

properties.name: download
properties.docs:
This attribute instructs browsers to download a URL instead of navigating to
it, so the user will be prompted to save it as a local file. If the attribute
has a value, it is used as the pre-filled file name in the Save prompt
(the user can still change the file name if they want).
properties.description:
This attribute instructs browsers to download a URL instead of navigating to
it, so the user will be prompted to save it as a local file. If the attribute
has a value, it is used as the pre-filled file name in the Save prompt
(the user can still change the file name if they want).

properties.name: elementType
properties.docs: The type of element.
properties.description: The type of element.

properties.name: href
properties.docs:
Contains a URL or a URL fragment that the hyperlink points to.
If this property is set, an anchor tag will be rendered instead of a button.
properties.description:
Contains a URL or a URL fragment that the hyperlink points to.
If this property is set, an anchor tag will be rendered instead of a button.

properties.name: loading
properties.docs: Specifies the loading animation location if applied.
properties.description: Specifies the loading animation location if applied.

properties.name: radius
properties.docs: Set to the value of border-radius applied. Default is 4(px).
properties.description: Set to the value of border-radius applied. Default is 4(px).

properties.name: rel
properties.docs:
Specifies the relationship of the target object to the link object.
The value is a space-separated list of [link types](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Link_types).
properties.description:
Specifies the relationship of the target object to the link object.
The value is a space-separated list of [link types](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Link_types).

properties.name: size
properties.docs: The pre-defined button size.
properties.description: The pre-defined button size.

properties.name: status
properties.docs: The status classing of the button.
properties.description: The status classing of the button.

properties.name: target
properties.docs:
Specifies where to display the linked URL.
Only applies when an `href` is provided.
properties.description:
Specifies where to display the linked URL.
Only applies when an `href` is provided.

properties.name: type
properties.docs: The type of the button.
properties.description: The type of the button.

properties.name: variation
properties.docs: The button variation.
properties.description: The button variation.

properties.name: width
properties.docs: Set to "full" for a 100% full-width button without border-radius/borders or to "block"`.
properties.description: Set to "full" for a 100% full-width button without border-radius/borders or to "block"`.

slots.docs: Content is placed between the named slots if provided without a slot.

slots.name: `button-icon`
slots.docs: Should be used on an icon in a button that has no text.

slots.name: `button-left`
slots.docs: Content is placed to the left of the button text.

slots.name: `button-right`
slots.docs: Content is placed to the right of the button text.

properties.name: elementType
properties.docs: The type of element.

properties.name: href
properties.docs:
Contains a URL or a URL fragment that the hyperlink points to.
If this property is set, an anchor tag will be rendered instead of a div.
properties.description:
Contains a URL or a URL fragment that the hyperlink points to.
If this property is set, an anchor tag will be rendered instead of a div.

properties.name: target
properties.docs:
Specifies where to display the linked URL.
Only applies when an `href` is provided.
properties.description:
Specifies where to display the linked URL.
Only applies when an `href` is provided.

properties.name: ariaLabel
properties.docs: Specifies the label to use for accessibility. Defaults to the icon name.
properties.description: Specifies the label to use for accessibility. Defaults to the icon name.

properties.name: color
properties.docs:
Optional color of the icon.
Use any `@color` in [core-primitives](https://unpkg.com/@core-ds/primitives/core-primitives.less) without `@color-`.
properties.description:
Optional color of the icon.
Use any `@color` in [core-primitives](https://unpkg.com/@core-ds/primitives/core-primitives.less) without `@color-`.

properties.name: icon
properties.docs:
A combination of both `name` and `src`. If a `src` url is detected
it will set the `src` property. Otherwise it assumes it's a built-in named
SVG and set the `name` property.
properties.description:
A combination of both `name` and `src`. If a `src` url is detected
it will set the `src` property. Otherwise it assumes it's a built-in named
SVG and set the `name` property.

properties.name: lazy
properties.docs: If enabled, core-icon will be loaded lazily when it's visible in the viewport.
properties.description: If enabled, core-icon will be loaded lazily when it's visible in the viewport.

properties.name: name
properties.docs: Specifies which icon to use from `src/core-icons`.
properties.description: Specifies which icon to use from `src/core-icons`.

properties.name: size
properties.docs:
The size of the icon.
Available options are: `"16"` and `"24"`.
properties.description:
The size of the icon.
Available options are: `"16"` and `"24"`.

properties.name: src
properties.docs: Specifies the exact `src` of an SVG file to use.
properties.description: Specifies the exact `src` of an SVG file to use.

properties.name: autofocus
properties.docs:
Boolean attribute lets you specify that a form control should
have input focus when the page loads.
properties.description:
Boolean attribute lets you specify that a form control should
have input focus when the page loads.

properties.name: clearInput
properties.docs:
If `true`, a clear icon will appear in the input when there is a
value. Clicking it clears the input.
properties.description:
If `true`, a clear icon will appear in the input when there is a
value. Clicking it clears the input.

properties.description: The label element associated with the element.

properties.name: labelDisplay
properties.docs: Sets the optional label to `inline` or `block` style [CSS display property](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/display).
properties.description: Sets the optional label to `inline` or `block` style [CSS display property](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/display).

properties.description: Instructional placeholder text that shows before the element has a value.

properties.name: required
properties.docs: If `true`, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form.
properties.description: If `true`, the user must fill in a value before submitting a form.

properties.name: size
properties.docs: Apply the large pre-defined element size and styling.
properties.description: Apply the large pre-defined element size and styling.

properties.name: success
properties.docs: If `true`, the pre-defined success state is applied.
properties.description: If `true`, the pre-defined success state is applied.

properties.name: type
properties.docs:
How an <input> works varies considerably depending on the value of
its type attribute, hence the different types are covered in their
own separate reference pages. If this attribute is not specified,
the default type adopted is `text`. [<input> types](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input)
properties.description:
How an <input> works varies considerably depending on the value of
its type attribute, hence the different types are covered in their
own separate reference pages. If this attribute is not specified,
the default type adopted is `text`. [<input> types](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input)
